recordTypes.name: Property Complaint Form
recordTypes.description: Report property code violations effortlessly through our user-friendly platform. Pinpoint issues on the map, attach photos, and help us maintain the charm of our community.

recordTypes.name: Certificate of Use - Resale (Residential)
recordTypes.description: Is required whenever there is a change in ownership of a residential property. An inspection must be performed to confirm that the proposed use complies with all ordinances, regulations and codes. NOTE: This permit is required prior to settlement.

recordTypes.name: Amusement Device Permit
recordTypes.description: Any automatic, mechanical,  or electronic machine designed to  operate as a game, or for entertainment and amusement, that requires some form of payment to use.

recordTypes.name: Bulk Pick Up
recordTypes.description: Special trash pickup for large items, large quantities of items, or appliances.

recordTypes.name: Contractor Registration
recordTypes.description: Any persons or firms who engage in construction, repairs, remodeling, rehabilitation or demolition, and operating as general contractors or subcontractors are required to obtain a license.

recordTypes.name: 1. Signing Up, Creating a Profile & Accessing Your Information
recordTypes.description: Instructions on signing up for a ViewPoint Cloud Account and how to access your profile and records.

recordTypes.name: Memorial Bench Application
recordTypes.description: A memorial bench provides the residents of Springfield Township with the opportunity to honor a loved one, celebrate a special event or honor a person or organization that has made a difference in our community

recordTypes.name: Application for Employment
recordTypes.description: If you are interested in joining the team at Springfield Township this is the correct application to fill out. Click select to get started!

recordTypes.name: Pole/Wire Complaint Form
recordTypes.description: Report utility issues

recordTypes.name: Block Party
recordTypes.description: This is a Block Party request form used to request the street to be closed and to request barricades.

recordTypes.name: 2. Applying for a Permit & Paying Fees
recordTypes.description: How to apply for a permit and pay any fees that are due.

recordTypes.name: Annual Fire Prevention License
recordTypes.description: All Commercial properties require an annual inspection.

recordTypes.name: Building Permit
recordTypes.description: Required to construct or alter any building in the Township or the use of any building or lot changed.

recordTypes.name: 3. Receiving Your Permit or Other Document
recordTypes.description: How to view and print your issued permit, license, or other issued document.

recordTypes.name: Commercial Certificate of Use/Occupancy
recordTypes.description: Required for any commercial property with a change in tenant or ownership, with or without construction

recordTypes.name: Employment Application Summer/Seasonal/Temp
recordTypes.description: If you are looking for seasonal, summer or temporary employment with Springfield Township, this is the correct application to fill out. Click select to get started!

recordTypes.name: Country Club Pool Employment Application
recordTypes.description: If you are seeking employment at the Country Club pool this is the correct application to fill out. Click select to get started!

recordTypes.name: Fire Prevention Permit
recordTypes.description: New Commercial & Residential Fire Sprinkler Systems, renovations to existing sprinkler systems, removal of underground storage tanks (including residential oil tanks)

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: All electrical work performed in  Springfield Township requires a permit.

recordTypes.name: Ice Rink Employment Application
recordTypes.description: If you are seeking employment at the Ice Rink this is the correct application to fill out. Click Select to get started!

recordTypes.name: URZ Permit
recordTypes.description: Must be used for instances such as all new construction, detached garages and decks under 30 inches.

recordTypes.name: Right to Know Request
recordTypes.description: Right to Know / Open Records Request Form

recordTypes.name: Certificate of Use -  Rental
recordTypes.description: Annual licenses to be issued after yearly inspections are performed by Code Enforcement to establish the obligations of both owners and tenants of rental units within the municipality to maintain the quality of rental units.

recordTypes.name: Street Opening Permit
recordTypes.description: Required for any person, firm, association or corporation requesting to close or open any highway, road, street, avenue, etc. including curb and apron, replacement of sewer/gas/water lines in the street

recordTypes.name: Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: Required to erect, alter, relocate or maintain an advertising display. Permitted signs may only be ground, projecting, facial or window-type.

recordTypes.name: Peddling/Soliciting License
recordTypes.description: This license application is required for individuals or businesses that engage in door-to-door selling or advertising of goods or services. It ensures that all peddlers and solicitors comply with local regulations and operate within the permitted guidelines.

recordTypes.name: Ice Cream/Food Vendor License
recordTypes.description: This license application is required for individuals or businesses that operate food trucks, food carts, ice cream trucks, or ice cream carts. It ensures that all vendors comply with local regulations and operate within the permitted guidelines.

recordTypes.name: Pool Permit
recordTypes.description: Required in order to construct, install, maintain, or alter a new pool/hot tub/spa and temporary pools that hold 24" of water.

recordTypes.name: Transient Retail Merchant License
recordTypes.description: This license application is required for individuals or businesses that plan to sell items from a table or cart on a temporary basis. It ensures that all transient retail merchants comply with local regulations and operate within the permitted guidelines.

recordTypes.name: Certificate of Use - Change of Tenant
recordTypes.description: For any residential change of tenants. When a new tenant replaces a tenant listed on an existing lease.

recordTypes.name: Grading Permit
recordTypes.description:
Any work that involves adding impervious surface to a property or changing the building foot print includes new construction, patios, additions for footings & foundations, driveways, decks, walkways, etc.

* A Storm Water Management Permit MUST accompany this form

recordTypes.name: Hotel, Motel, & Inn Annual License
recordTypes.description: To operate a hotel, motel or inn within the Township you must first obtain a license.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description: When any new or existing plumbing system needs to be installed, altered, repaired or replaced.  This includes sewer connections, drainage piping work, excavation or water heating equipment.

recordTypes.name: Fence Permit
recordTypes.description: Required to erect, install, alter or relocate any new or existing fence.

recordTypes.name: Mechanical Permit
recordTypes.description: Required when any mechanical system is installed, altered, repaired, replaced or remodeled.

recordTypes.name: Storm Water Management Permit
recordTypes.description: Required for review of any Storm Water Management Site Plan and related data.

recordTypes.name: Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description:
Required to demolish an entire building or structure, partial demolition as well as interior demolition. 
**Note: If you remove more than two-thirds of existing framing and alter any outside wall, it is considered complete demolition.

recordTypes.name: Wall Permit
recordTypes.description: Required to erect, install, alter or relocate any wall or retaining wall.

recordTypes.name: POD Permit
recordTypes.description: Required when any portable storage unit or container is placed on any residential or commercial property.

recordTypes.name: On-Street Dumpster Permit
recordTypes.description: Required for any dumpster and/or open-top container placed on a public street.

recordTypes.name: Shed Permit
recordTypes.description: Required for any type of shed regardless of size. Only one shed is permitted per property.

recordTypes.name: Shade Tree Permit
recordTypes.description: A shade tree permit is  required ONLY for removal of tree(s) that over hang in the public right-of-way.

categories.name: Building Department
categories.content: Please be aware that some residential permit applications may take up to 7 to 10 working days for approval
